description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Sam Newman - Technologist at ThoughtWorks

ABSTRACT
Microservices are all the range, and so are security breaches! Learn what you can do to try and have one without the other. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7777

title: Appsec and Microservices
